column5: Well like most of Ontario we got blitzed by a snowstorm last night. (6-8 in)  The wife and I went outside to clean off the truck and survey this latest gift from Mom Nature.  And with almost military precision we watched all the neighbors with equipment---plows---blowers--loaders  cleaning up the drives for those without---some elderly--some not--me also---and no money changed hands.  Gotta love small towns..  Got any good news of your own---lets hear it

My Nanny just got her results back from her Operation monday - thanks to the whole gang they came back positive so my potential week of hell turned out to be one hell of a week!   :thumbsup_anim:    post coming at some point today!
Positive...as in negative... as in no spreading cancer or anything like that!

On payday this past week the plant manager called an ALL STAFF meeting. Seems we exceeded all our target numbers for last year...so in appreciation...we all got bonus cheques for 3.9% of last years pay. Roughly 2 weeks pay for a bonus.  :thumbsup_anim:  Not as "Feel good" nice as your lead off story bushart...but totally unexpected AND appreciated.  My Crystal Ball has predicted new fishing toys in the near future  ..unless of course it gets trumped by Debbe's Honeydew crystal ball
All great stories----the nicest things are those unexpected
